function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of representation of space usage of pedestrians at a microscopic scale in current disease-spreading models","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the impact of social distance measures at a building level","Mitigation":"Developing a general occupant exposure model to retrofit microscopic crowd models","Technologies":"Occupant exposure modeling software, microscopic crowd modeling software","People":"Decision makers, building occupants","Owner":"Research institutions, software developers"},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive sub-models in crowd models for performing occupant exposure analysis","Impact":"Inability to quantitatively understand the impact of different measures on building occupant exposure","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive sub-models within crowd models specifically for occupant exposure analysis","Technologies":"Crowd modeling software, occupant exposure modeling software","People":"Researchers, crowd modeling experts","Owner":"Research institutions, modeling software developers"},{"Description":"Inability to assess the impact of disease spread in confined spaces without microscopic crowd models","Impact":"Limited ability to perform risk assessment for disease spreading within buildings","Mitigation":"Utilizing microscopic crowd models for simulating disease spread within confined spaces","Technologies":"Microscopic crowd modeling software, disease spreading simulation software","People":"Risk assessors, building managers","Owner":"Organizations specializing in disease spreading simulation"}]}
